mapper.update:
update adopt_appliment
adopt_id = #{adoptId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

job = #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where appliment_id = #{applimentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
